TopicTitle: What is up with the merge function? Is this broken?

Articles.Content:
Merge craft does not merge. 

Well actually I do think I got it to work once or twice. Had to fart around with the root selection on the craft I was bringing in to merge if I recall. But it would be nice to know how to get it to merge correctly (and not be totally faded out) every time.

Merge function is basically a subassembly at the wrong place. To properly attach the "merged" craft you have to have a free node on its root part.

Otherwise, you can load (Merge) it, place it anywhere in the VAB, and while it is in "transparency" shift + left click to select only a part of it.

Only the one loaded using Merge must have a free node at its root part. Obviously you also need a node on the Load craft if you want to attach the Merge craft, but it can be anywhere, and surface attachement also works.
